page.title: 04The War Memorial Hall
page.content: During May 1984 to 1985,the War Memorial Hall,New Milton,held a variety of entertainments such as: Cardiff Male Choir concert, table sales and markets, Craft Fairs, Dances, Poppy Club, Fashion Shows, Social Evenings, Flower Shows, Orchestral Concerts, Plays, Fabric Shows, Yoga, Floral Society, Stamp Exhibitions, Antique Show, Boxing, Art Shows, Childrens-wear sales, Cookery Demonstrations, Hair Fashion Shows, Judo, Film Shows and Discos, Band Concerts, Computer and Video Fairs, Old Time Music Hall, Toy Fair and Christmas Carol Concerts. There are also live Discos and music at Hookeys Wine Bar in Osborne Road and at the Woodpecker and Speckled Trout public houses.
